#summary Mark a room as "inactive" for a particular period.

== Process ==

Effectively, we add a booking with 0 payment amount to the dates to deactivate covering all the beds in the room.

  # Click Add Booking.
  # Set name to "Inactive".
  # Select the dates that the room should be inactive for. (Obviously, there can't be any bookings for the dates selected).
  # For number of guests, enter the total number of beds in the room. 
  # Click Add. 
  # Click Save.
